data.note: AER's budget is around XFA 20bn ($33.7m) for three years.
data.name: Rural electrification budget

data.note: The cost of a new connection is $59.32, inclusive of VAT, but is higher if far from the nearest line. Officially, it takes five days from the day of request. Adding a meter to an existing connection costs about $30. Corruption is an issue - one ancedote describes how utility officials claimed the connection for a new-build area would require additional transformers at a cost of XFA 2m-3m ($3,000-$5,000) and expected bribes of around XFA 400,000 ($700) to make that requirement go away.
data.name: New connection cost
